venue.address_1: off Fort Hill & Beal Street - The entrance across from the West Hingham Commuter Rail Stop
venue.name: Bare Cove

item.description: This is a really nice 4 mile walk.  The dogs have a blast here and the footing is good, since they do plow it regularly.  So, until the trails get better, I am going to stick with Bare Cove.
item.why: I have gone to a few of the places where I normally lead hikes and the footing is really tough to walk on and with the upcoming forecast, it will only get worse.
item.name: Bare Cove
